msg_success_body:
The caster for your application, was created successfully!

You can find it under the "{menuName}" section.
msg_no_folder_body:
Could not find the plug-in folder; please check your installation:

{missingFolder}
dir_back_desc: Go back to the previous list of folders and files.
input_main_menu_desc: Go back to the main menu.
dir_app_address_desc:
Navigate to the directory containing the executable of the application you want to launch.

Current Selection:  {appAddress}
dir_app_icon_desc:
Navigate to the directory containing a compatible image to use for the application's icon.

Current Selection:  {iconAddress}
dir_app_art_desc:
Navigate to the directory containing a compatible image to use for the application's icon.

Current Selection:  {artAddress}
dir_app_desc_desc:
Navigate to the directory containing a file with a description of the application.

Current Selection:  {descAddress}
btn_create_caster_desc: Creates a link to the selected application within the "{createInSec}" section, allowing you to launch it via Plex.
